query.prompt:

Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
4 e la notte, che opposita a lui cerchia, 5 uscia di Gange fuor con le Bilance, 6 che le caggion di man quando soverchia;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
7 sì che le bianche e le vermiglie guance, 8 là dov’ i’ era, de la bella Aurora 9 per troppa etate divenivan rance.

query.result: 7 Tathā ca śuklāḥ ca rakta-varṇāś ca kapolāḥ, 8 Tatrāham āsītām, sundara-Uṣasaḥ 9 Atiriktāyusā palitāḥ abhavan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
10 Noi eravam lunghesso mare ancora, 11 come gente che pensa a suo cammino, 12 che va col cuore e col corpo dimora.
query.error: **English:** 10 We were still along the shore, 11 like people who are thinking about their journey, 12 who go with their heart and their body still.
query.result: 10 Vayam asmākaḥ samīpe samudrasya eva, 11 Yathā janāḥ ye cintenti sva-gamana-mārga-viṣaye, 12 Ye gacchanti hṛdayena saha eva, śarīreṇa saha ca sthitāḥ.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.result: 13 Eva ca, yathā, prātaḥkālena ākrāntaḥ, 14 sthūleṣu vāṣpeṣu Mangalaḥ raktavarṇaḥ bhavati 15 adhaḥ paścime diśi samudrasya upari,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
16 cotal m’apparve, s’io ancor lo veggia, 17 un lume per lo mar venir sì ratto, 18 che ’l muover suo nessun volar pareggia.

query.result: 16 tathā mām prati adarśata, yadi aham adyāpi tam paśyāmi, 17 ekaḥ prakāśaḥ samudrasya pāreṇa āgacchan evam śīghram, 18 yasya gatiḥ na kaścit pakṣiśaknoti samatulyam kartum.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
19 Dal qual com’ io un poco ebbi ritratto 20 l’occhio per domandar lo duca mio, 21 rividil più lucente e maggior fatto.
query.error: **English:** 19 From which, when I had withdrawn my gaze a little, 20 to ask my guide, 21 I saw him again, brighter and larger in appearance.
query.result: 19 Yasmāt kadācid aham alpam apahṛtya 20 cakṣuḥ praśnotum mama netāram, 21 punar adṛkṣam tam prakāśavatāram atiśayitavṛddham ca rūpeṇa.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
22 Poi d’ogne lato ad esso m’appario 23 un non sapeva che bianco, e di sotto 24 a poco a poco un altro a lui uscìo.
query.error: **English:** 22 Then on every side appeared to me 23 one who did not know what, white, and from beneath 24 little by little another came forth to him.
query.result: 22 Tataḥ sarvataḥ tasmai adarśanam āgataṃ 23 ekaḥ kiṃ nāmajānāti śuklaḥ, tataḥ adhastāt 24 alpam alpam anyaḥ tasmāt niṣkrāntaḥ.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
31 Vedi che sdegna li argomenti umani, 32 sì che remo non vuol, né altro velo 33 che l’ali sue, tra liti sì lontani.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
88 Rispuosemi: «Così com’ io t’amai 89 nel mortal corpo, così t’amo sciolta: 90 però m’arresto; ma tu perché vai?».
query.error: **English:** 88 He answered me: "Just as I loved you 89 in the mortal body, so I love you freed: 90 therefore I stop; but why do you go?".
query.result: 88 Saḥ uvāca: "Yathā aham tvām apremṇā 89 martya-śarīre, tathā tvām apremṇā vimuktām: 90 atas tvām pratiṣṭhāmi; kimartham tvam gacchasi?".

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.result: 91 Kaśalā mama, punar āvartanaṃ kartum 92 tatra yatra aham asmi, ayam maya prayāsaḥ kriyate," 93 iti aham uvāca; "katham tu tava ayam kālaḥ apahṛtaḥ?"
